title: 18th Infantry Division (Greece)
text:
The 18th Infantry Division (; "XVIII Merarchia Pezikou", "XVIII MP") was an <a href="infantry">infantry</a> <a href="division%20%28military%29">division</a> of the <a href="Hellenic%20Army">Hellenic Army</a> that fought in the <a href="Battle%20of%20the%20Metaxas%20Line">Battle of the Metaxas Line</a>.
The division was formed in December 1940, under <a href="Major%20General">Major General</a> <a href="Leonidas%20Stergiopoulos">Leonidas Stergiopoulos</a>. It was subordinated to the <a href="Eastern%20Macedonia%20Army%20Section">Eastern Macedonia Army Section</a> (TSAM) and faced the German attack on 6 April 1941 in the area of <a href="Mount%20Beles">Mount Beles</a>. The division was unable to halt the German attack, which outflanked TSAM and led to its surrender on 9 April.
